snippet: The most trendy music festival of the year has been surpassed by the parties that pop up around it.
abstract: Many would-be Coachella Valley Music and Arts Festival attendees are forgoing the concerts, and instead are hopping around to invitation-only parties that feature free food, alcohol, music and select crowds.
lead_paragraph: The most trendy music festival of the year has been surpassed by the parties that pop up around it.

headline.main: Come for Coachella, but Party at #nochella
headline.print_headline: Come for Coachella, but Party at #nochella

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Coachella Valley Music and Arts Festival
